issue.title: Use source maps
issue.body:
Hi,

I don't really understand how this package works so I apologise in advance if this isn't the right place to make this question.

On my project, the code that reaches the browser is processed by babel. The final code has source maps that google chrome uses to show the original source when I open the dev tools. However the puppeteer coverage information of a file shows the processed source code, not the original. Is there a way to convert the `text` and `ranges` fields of the coverage object to the original source and line numbers?

Thank you for your antention

issue.title: Set custom path for output
issue.body: Now the path to .nyc_output is not configurable. Is it possible to add support for this? For example if I need to generate raw data to the different path. Example /user/home/project/folder/.nyc_output

issue.title: Version updates
issue.body: The main update is for [v8-to-istanbul](https://npmjs.com/v8-to-istanbul), which now supports source maps.

issue.title: JavaScript heap out of memory
issue.body:
On a large repository with lots of lines of code the call to `JSON.stringify` takes too much memory.

This issue can be resolved by increasing node's `--max-old-space-size`.
But it still takes a very a long time and consumes a lot of memory.

Versions:
puppeteer-to-istanbul: v1.2.2
node: 12.13.0

```
<--- Last few GCs --->
ll[54403:0x108000000]   687264 ms: Mark-sweep 2047.3 (2070.5) -> 2045.7 (2074.8) MB, 879.1 / 0.1 ms  (+ 367.6 ms in 88 steps since start of marking, biggest step 8.7 ms, walltime since start of marking 1303 ms) (average mu = 0.121, current mu = 0.045) alloc[54403:0x108000000]   688644 ms: Mark-sweep 2051.3 (2074.8) -> 2050.0 (2078.5) MB, 914.3 / 0.1 ms  (+ 409.5 ms in 78 steps since start of marking, biggest step 12.5 ms, walltime since start of marking 1379 ms) (average mu = 0.081, current mu = 0.041) allo

<--- JS stacktrace --->

==== JS stack trace =========================================

Security context: 0x0cfd54e408a1 <JSObject>
    0: builtin exit frame: stringify(this=0x0cfd54e5f199 <Object map = 0xcfdb0505341>,0x0cfd146804a9 <undefined>,0x0cfd146804a9 <undefined>,0x0cfd91556689 <Object map = 0xcfd3bd97541>,0x0cfd54e5f199 <Object map = 0xcfdb0505341>)

    1: arguments adaptor frame: 1->3
    2: writeIstanbulFormat [0xcfd59a7f831] [/Users/.../node_modules/puppeteer-to-istanbul/lib/puppeteer...

FATAL ERROR: Ineffective mark-compacts near heap limit Allocation failed - JavaScript heap out of memory
 1: 0x10007e743 node::Abort() [/usr/local/bin/node]
 2: 0x10007e8c7 node::OnFatalError(char const*, char const*) [/usr/local/bin/node]
 3: 0x100176267 v8::Utils::ReportOOMFailure(v8::internal::Isolate*, char const*, bool) [/usr/local/bin/node]
 4: 0x100176203 v8::internal::V8::FatalProcessOutOfMemory(v8::internal::Isolate*, char const*, bool) [/usr/local/bin/node]
 5: 0x1002fa2b5 v8::internal::Heap::FatalProcessOutOfMemory(char const*) [/usr/local/bin/node]
 6: 0x1002fb984 v8::internal::Heap::RecomputeLimits(v8::internal::GarbageCollector) [/usr/local/bin/node]
 7: 0x1002f8857 v8::internal::Heap::PerformGarbageCollection(v8::internal::GarbageCollector, v8::GCCallbackFlags) [/usr/local/bin/node]
 8: 0x1002f683d v8::internal::Heap::CollectGarbage(v8::internal::AllocationSpace, v8::internal::GarbageCollectionReason, v8::GCCallbackFlags) [/usr/local/bin/node]
 9: 0x100301f54 v8::internal::Heap::AllocateRawWithLightRetry(int, v8::internal::AllocationType, v8::internal::AllocationAlignment) [/usr/local/bin/node]
10: 0x100301fcf v8::internal::Heap::AllocateRawWithRetryOrFail(int, v8::internal::AllocationType, v8::internal::AllocationAlignment) [/usr/local/bin/node]
11: 0x1002d0cda v8::internal::Factory::NewRawOneByteString(int, v8::internal::AllocationType) [/usr/local/bin/node]
12: 0x100670a82 v8::internal::IncrementalStringBuilder::Extend() [/usr/local/bin/node]
13: 0x1003f208c v8::internal::JsonStringifier::SerializeString(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::String>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
14: 0x1003f528a v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Result v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Serialize_<true>(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, bool, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
15: 0x1003f76d5 v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Result v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Serialize_<true>(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, bool, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
16: 0x1003f76d5 v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Result v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Serialize_<true>(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, bool, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
17: 0x1003f2c0a v8::internal::JsonStringifier::SerializeJSReceiverSlow(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::JSReceiver>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
18: 0x1003f60c4 v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Result v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Serialize_<true>(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, bool, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
19: 0x1003f76d5 v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Result v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Serialize_<true>(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, bool, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
20: 0x1003f2c0a v8::internal::JsonStringifier::SerializeJSReceiverSlow(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::JSReceiver>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
21: 0x1003f3911 v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Result v8::internal::JsonStringifier::Serialize_<false>(v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, bool, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
22: 0x1003ef2dc v8::internal::JsonStringify(v8::internal::Isolate*, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>, v8::internal::Handle<v8::internal::Object>) [/usr/local/bin/node]
23: 0x1002192ca v8::internal::Builtin_JsonStringify(int, unsigned long*, v8::internal::Isolate*) [/usr/local/bin/node]
24: 0x10092fcd9 Builtins_CEntry_Return1_DontSaveFPRegs_ArgvOnStack_BuiltinExit [/usr/local/bin/node]
```
